title: Rare siamese cat with dwarfism, 'Baby B', steamrolls the internet by blepping every time she feels happy, making feline fanatics everywhere smile
description: Big cats, small cats, medium-sized cats, chonkers, and even smol cats are all loved here at the I Can Has Cheezburger offices. Let's just say that if it meows, it's getting snuggles around here. We spend our days writing about the funniest cat memes on the internet and some of the world's most famous felines, but on days like today, we are happy to introduce you to a fresh feline who is taking the internet by storm. She got the whole internet on her side with a single picture, and you might never have even heard of her!Meet 'Baby B', a Siamese cat with dwarfism who has the hissterical habit of blepping every time she feels happy. Not only are siamese cats not very common, but being born with dwarfism makes her especially unique as well. She's purrmanently kitten-sized, as if she needed anything else to make her even cuter. Scroll down to see more of Baby B's beautiful bleps below!Fluff. Chaos. Drama! Our weekly cat newsletter has it all -  subscribe here.
author: Blake Seidel
excerpt: Rare siamese cat with dwarfism, 'Baby B', steamrolls the internet by blepping every time she feels happy, making feline fanatics everywhere smile - World's largest collection of cat memes and other animals

html:
Big cats, small cats, medium-sized cats, chonkers, and even smol cats are all loved here at the I Can Has Cheezburger offices. Let's just say that if it meows, it's getting snuggles around here. We spend our days writing about the funniest cat memes on the internet and some of the world's most famous felines, but on days like today, we are happy to introduce you to a fresh feline who is taking the internet by storm. She got the whole internet on her side with a single picture, and you might never have even heard of her!

Meet 'Baby B', a Siamese cat with dwarfism who has the hissterical habit of blepping every time she feels happy. Not only are siamese cats not very common, but being born with dwarfism makes her especially unique as well. She's purrmanently kitten-sized, as if she needed anything else to make her even cuter. Scroll down to see more of Baby B's beautiful bleps below!

Fluff. Chaos. Drama! Our weekly cat newsletter has it all -  subscribe here.
